description: Uncommon Projects moved into their new showroom in June 2022. The showroom will be open for walk in visitors for the duration of Open House.

factsheet.heading: Background
paragraphs: At Uncommon Projects, we have been designing, manufacturing and installing bespoke kitchens and furniture for a decade. Our founders, the architect Alan Drumm and the product designer James Hoy, set up our studio in London, in 2011, armed with a wealth of experience in interior architecture, design and manufacture, a mutual affection for the early modernist aesthetic, and a shared appreciation of the material possibilities of plywood.
In June 2022, we moved into our new showroom at Design District. Located in Building B2 by 6A Architects.

name: Uncommon Projects
